entry.def: A check-up is a medical examination by your doctor or dentist to make sure that there is nothing wrong with your health.

example.ex: The disease was detected during a routine check-up.
example.tran: 这个病是在做常规体检时查出来的。
去牙医诊所的常规牙齿检查

means.word_mean: 1. a thorough physical examination; includes a variety of tests depending on the age and sex and health of the person
